appName: VRealm Funverse – Ultimate VR Game Hub

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: VRealm Funverse – Ultimate VR Game Hub
display_name: VRealm Funverse – Ultimate VR Game Hub
display_long_description:
**VRealm Funverse – Your Expanding VR Universe!**

Step inside **VRealm Funverse**, a world of hand-tracked VR games built for fun, creativity, and physics-based action.
Play across multiple genres — from slicing fruits and shooting waves to boxing, painting, and stacking challenges — all in one evolving hub.

**Main Games**

**Fruit Frenzy** – Slice fast, score higher, master the blade.

**Bullet Rush** – Dodge, shoot, and survive the rush.

**Fist Fight** – Step into the ring and brawl against AI boxers.

**Rhythm Slash** – Cut the beats, feel the rhythm.

**Punch Beats** – Box to the beat, fight with rhythm.

**Stack Master** – Move smart, build high, conquer the tower.

**Color Splash** – Unleash creativity on endless canvases.


**Free Beta Games**

**Puck Clash** – Fast shots, sharp rebounds, endless duels.

**Beat Forge** – Craft music, play drums, forge the beat.

**Upcoming Worlds (from March 2026)**
**Arrow Storm**, **Sky Plank**, **Smash Court**, **Shuttle Clash**, **Hoop Rush**, **Strike Zone**,
**Ice Clash**, **Disc Dash**, **Monster Mash**, **Color Flow**, **Pedal Rush**, and **Drift Zone**.

**Support the Vision**
Made by a solo developer for the VR community — every purchase supports future updates, multiplayer modes, and new worlds in the Funverse.
